example.source: <a:browser id = "browser" src = "http://www.google.com" width = "600" height = "600"> </a:browser> <a:hbox width="600" height="34" margin="10 0 0 0"> <a:button width="120" onclick = "browser.setAttribute('src', 'http://www.google.com')"> www.google.com</a:button> <a:button width="120" edge="5" onclick = "browser.setAttribute('src', 'http://www.w3c.org')"> www.w3c.org</a:button> </a:hbox>
